For
Passengers
{{flight.airline}}
{{flight.remainingBumberOfSeats}} Remaining Seats
{{flight.departure?.place}}
{{flight.departure?.date | date}}
{{flight.departure?.date | date:'shortTime'}}
{{flight.price}}
Book
{{flight.arrival?.place}}
{{flight.arrival?.date | date}}
{{flight.arrival?.date | date:'shortTime'}}
import { Component, OnInit } from '@angular/core'; import * as moment from 'moment'; import { FlightRm } from '../api/models'; import { FlightService } from '../api/services/flight.service'; @Component({ selector: 'app-search-flights', templateUrl: './search-flights.component.html', styleUrls: ['./search-flights.component.css'] }) export class SearchFlightsComponent implements OnInit { searchResult: FlightRm[] = []; constructor(private flightService: FlightService) { } ngOnInit(): void { } search() { this.flightService.searchFlight({}).subscribe(responce => this.searchResult = responce, this.handleError); } private handleError(err: any) { console.log(err) } }
